description: Profile management surface for authenticated users.

resources.title: Manage your profile
resources.subtitle: Update how other people see you on CharHub. Preferences that are still being migrated will appear here soon.

identity.description: Pick an avatar to represent you across chats and characters.
identity.placeholderNote: Avatar uploads will be available after we reconnect the media service.

details.description: These values are shared with collaborators and used as defaults in conversations.

contentClassification.description: Configure content filters to control what types of characters and stories you want to see. Only content matching your selected preferences will be recommended to you.
contentClassification.filterNote: Select content types you want to ALLOW. Unchecked items will be filtered out from recommendations.
contentClassification.allAgesNote: All content types are blocked when "All Ages" rating is selected.
contentClassification.birthDateRequiredMessage: Please fill in your birth date in the Profile tab to unlock content classification settings. This ensures age-appropriate content recommendations.
contentClassification.maxAgeRatingHint: Select the maximum age rating you want to see

preferences.placeholder: Content preferences, blur settings and sensitive themes will return once the moderation service is integrated.

security.description: Your CharHub sessions inherit OAuth security from Google or Facebook. Multi-factor support will be added soon.
security.placeholder: Session management and passwordless login controls are on the roadmap.
